definition: Buddhist nun/(often used in phonetic spellings)

sentences.english: Generally, WNV is spread by the bite of an infected mosquito.
sentences.chinese: 一般而言，西尼罗河病毒是由受到感染的蚊子传播的。

sentences.english: Luxor, a city on the banks of the Nile, was our next stop.
sentences.chinese: 位于尼罗河岸的卢克孛城是我们的下一站。

sentences.english: I looked upon the Nile and raised the pyramids above it.
sentences.chinese: 我仰望尼罗河，在那上面建造金字塔。

sentences.english: For thous_ands of years, man has been drawn to the Nile, known as "the Mt. Everest of rivers."
sentences.chinese: 数千年来，人类一直都为尼罗河而深深吸引和痴迷。

sentences.english: West Nile virus is mainly transmitted to people through the bites of infected mosquitoes.
sentences.chinese: 西尼罗河病毒主要通过受感染蚊子的叮咬传播给人类。

sentences.english: The estuary of blue Nile on lake Tana.
sentences.chinese: 塔纳湖上，青尼罗河的入口。

sentences.english: He directed his troops toward the Nile Delta.
sentences.chinese: 他挥师直捣尼罗河三角洲一带。

sentences.english: West Nile virus first appeared in North America in 1999.
sentences.chinese: 西尼罗河病毒最早是1999年在北美洲被发现的。
他们乘船顺尼罗河而下。

sentences.english: Another example, the Nile, looks more worrying but is perhaps more hopeful.
sentences.chinese: 另一例，尼罗河似乎更令人担心，但也许也更有希望。

sentences.english: Transmission of WNV to laboratory workers has been reported.
sentences.chinese: 曾有西尼罗河病毒传给实验室工作人员的报告。

sentences.english: First West Nile Virus-positive unit of blood intercepted.
sentences.chinese: 从血液中截获第一例西尼罗河病毒阳性单位。

sentences.english: Nile empties into a large delta that consequently empties into the Mediterranean Sea.
sentences.chinese: 尼罗河流入大型三角洲，而后注入地中海。

sentences.english: See the pyramids along the nile.
sentences.chinese: 当你遥看金字塔沿著尼罗。

sentences.english: About 20% of people who become infected with WNV will develop West Nile fever.
sentences.chinese: 西尼罗河病毒感染者中，约20%会发展为西尼罗热。

sentences.english: About 20% of people who become infected with WNV will develop West Nile fever.
sentences.chinese: 西尼罗河病毒感染者中，约20%会发展为西尼罗热。

definition: Pali, language of Theravad Pali canon/Barry (name)/Gareth Barry (1981-), English footballer
Dole (name)/Bob Dole (1923-), US Republican politician, Kansas senator 1969-1996
Acre, city in Israel, also known as Akko
Ur (Sumerian city c. 4500 BC in modern Iraq)
rad (unit of absorbed dose of ionizing radiation) (loanword)
